jobDescription: Sales Development Manager – Upper MW Work Location  MI - Lansing Job Code 4328 Department  SalesApply NowCentral Garden & Pet Company (NASDAQ:CENT and CENTA), is a leading innovator, marketer and producer of quality branded products for the pet, lawn and garden supplies markets. Our Central Life Sciences Agricultural Products Division is focused on delivering insect management solutions for challenging pests in livestock, grain storage and processing, horticulture, turf, along with ant control in food crops. We have an outstanding opportunity available for a Sales Development Manager on our Agricultural Products Team. The successful individual will be responsible for supporting sales and territory management along with market planning and product adoption in their assigned area. This role is a remote, home office based field sales position. Desirable candidates will be based in the Lansing, MI area.  We need organized individuals who can follow through on key business opportunities for insect management solutions to the agriculture industry. The sales development manager will implement successful business development plans in concert with corporate objectives, supporting key accounts, reporting on market and competition, as well as, developing market assessment for our product portfolio in assigned areas. The sales development manager represents Central Life Sciences at key industry associations, trade shows, dealer & producer meetings and in various industry seminars. More product information can be found at www.AltosidIGR.com, www.CentralFlyControl.com , www.bugfreegrains.com , or www.starbarproducts.com .  Please see our corporate web site for additional company information; all interested applicants must apply online at our “careers” page – www.central.com or www.centrallifesciences.com .
